imdb.plot outline: Playing House, is an irreverent lifestyle show starring Karen Bertelsen. The 7-part series takes all the best of the W Network and showcases it in a fun and informative half-hour. Each episode features how-to segments covering a wide range of topics from health and wellness to beauty and style, and shopping and money to home and garden. Karen and her team of visiting experts offer tips and advice, whether it's a lesson on what pairs well with wine, buying a BBQ or how to fix a leaky tap. Through it all, Karen acts as our lifestyle guinea pig, the anti-Martha, someone who will try almost anything once to show our viewers at home a new tip or trick that they can use in everyday life.
imdb.title: Playing House
plot: Each episode of _Playing House_ (qv) features features how-to segments covering a wide range of topics from health and wellness to beauty and style, and shopping and money to home and garden.::Meline Nadeau

_Playing House_ (qv), is an irreverent lifestyle show starring Karen Bertelsen. The 7-part series takes all the best of the W Network and showcases it in a fun and informative half-hour. Each episode features how-to segments covering a wide range of topics from health and wellness to beauty and style, and shopping and money to home and garden. Karen and her team of visiting experts offer tips and advice, whether it's a lesson on what pairs well with wine, buying a BBQ or how to fix a leaky tap. Through it all, Karen acts as our lifestyle guinea pig, the anti-Martha, someone who will try almost anything once to show our viewers at home a new tip or trick that they can use in everyday life.::Marianne Wisenthal
